#summary This page describes progresses for the Jython/Vistrails project.

= Introduction =

The project described in this page concerns the port of Vistrails into Java with the help of Jython (a Python implementation running on a Java virtual machine).


= Steps =

MID-JULY 2011: Project starts.

END OF JULY 2011: Units tests for the Vistrails core have been run on Jython

13 SEPTEMBER 2011: Displaying the version tree with Jython/Swing.
